dtliExcerpt: “Redwood” is not a wholly satisfying Broadway musical, despite those striking visuals, as well some unusual vertical choreography and the glorious voices of the five talented cast members, who make the most of Broadway newcomer Kate Diaz’s 19 mostly serviceable musical numbers.

keyPhrases.quote: not a wholly satisfying Broadway musical
glorious voices of the five talented cast members
